channel.title: FestiveTechCalendar on Keith Atherton
channel.description: Recent content in FestiveTechCalendar on Keith Atherton

item.title: Festive Tech Calendar 2022
item.description: The Festive Tech Calendar 2022 online event ran throughout December, 2022 and was fantastic! I was privileged to be one of the co-organisers along with Gregor Suttie, Richard Hooper, Simon Lee, and Lisa Hoving. It was great to work with the organising team, speakers, our chosen charity, supporters, and everyone else, to be able to deliver a wonderful event. There was a huge number of sessions submitted, and all event sessions are still available for catch-up here:
